General.Name: MNRB Holdings Bhd
General.Description: MNRB Holdings Berhad, an investment holding company, operates in the general reinsurance, takaful, and retakaful businesses in Malaysia and internationally. It offers general reinsurance, and family and general retakaful services; financial protection services; and general takaful solutions, such as motor and non-motor general takaful protection products. The company distributes its products through agents, brokers, financial institutions, motor franchise holders, and co-operatives, as well as a digital platform. The company was formerly known as Malaysian National Reinsurance Berhad and changed its name to MNRB Holdings Berhad in April 2005. MNRB Holdings Berhad was incorporated in 1972 and is based in Kuala Lumpur, Malaysia.
